tooltip.mega_showdown.aloraichium-z.tool: Z-Crystal associated with Alolan Raichu and allows it to upgrade its Thunderbolt into the special Z-Move Stoked Sparksurfer.
tooltip.mega_showdown.buginium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the Bug type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Bug-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.darkinium-z.toolti: Z-Crystal associated with the Dark type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Dark-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.decidium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with Decidueye and allows it to upgrade its Spirit Shackle into the special Z-Move Sinister Arrow Raid.
tooltip.mega_showdown.dragonium-z.toolti: Z-Crystal associated with the Dragon type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Dragon-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.eevium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with Eevee and allows it to upgrade its Last Resort into the special Z-Move Extreme Evoboost.
tooltip.mega_showdown.electrium-z.toolti: Z-Crystal associated with the Electric type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Electric-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.fairium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the Fairy type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Fairy-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.fightinium-z.toolt: Z-Crystal associated with the Fighting type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Fighting-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.firium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the Fire type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Fire-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.flyinium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the Flying type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Flying-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.ghostium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the Ghost type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Ghost-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.grassium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the Grass type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Grass-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.groundium-z.toolti: Z-Crystal associated with the Ground type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Ground-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.icium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the Ice type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Ice-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.incinium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with Incineroar and allows it to upgrade its Darkest Lariat into the special Z-Move Malicious Moonsault.
tooltip.mega_showdown.kommonium-z.toolti: Z-Crystal associated with Kommo-o and allows it to upgrade its Clanging Scales into the special Z-Move Clangorous Soulblaze.
tooltip.mega_showdown.lunalium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with Lunala and Dawn Wings Necrozma and allows either to upgrade its Moongeist Beam into the special Z-Move Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom.
tooltip.mega_showdown.lycanium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with Lycanroc and allows it to upgrade its Stone Edge into the special Z-Move Splintered Stormshards.
tooltip.mega_showdown.marshadium-z.toolt: Z-Crystal associated with Marshadow and allows it to upgrade its Spectral Thief into the special Z-Move Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike.
tooltip.mega_showdown.mewnium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with Mew and allows it to upgrade its Psychic into the special Z-Move Genesis Supernova.
tooltip.mega_showdown.mimikium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with Mimikyu and allows it to upgrade its Play Rough into the special Z-Move Let's Snuggle Forever.
tooltip.mega_showdown.normalium-z.toolti: Z-Crystal associated with the Normal type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Normal-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.pikanium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with Pikachu and allows it to upgrade its Volt Tackle into the special Z-Move Catastropika.
tooltip.mega_showdown.pikashunium-z.tool: Z-Crystal associated with Pikachu in a cap and allows it to upgrade its Thunderbolt into the special Z-Move 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt.
tooltip.mega_showdown.poisonium-z.toolti: Z-Crystal associated with the Poison type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Poison-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.primarium-z.toolti: Z-Crystal associated with Primarina and allows it to upgrade its Sparkling Aria into the special Z-Move Oceanic Operetta.
tooltip.mega_showdown.psychium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the Psychic type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Psychic-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.rockium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the Rock type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Rock-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.snorlium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with Snorlax and allows it to upgrade its Giga Impact into the special Z-Move Pulverizing Pancake.
tooltip.mega_showdown.solganium-z.toolti: Z-Crystal associated with Solgaleo and Dusk Mane Necrozma and allows either to upgrade its Sunsteel Strike into the special Z-Move Searing Sunraze Smash.
tooltip.mega_showdown.steelium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the Steel type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Steel-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.tapunium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the tapu and allows them to upgrade their Nature's Madness into the special Z-Move Guardian of Alola.
tooltip.mega_showdown.ultranecrozium-z.t: Z-Crystal associated with Necrozma which allows it to transform into Ultra Necrozma after fusing with Solgaleo or Lunala, and also allows it to upgrade its Photon Geyser into the signature Z-Move Light That Burns the Sky when it is Ultra Necrozma.
tooltip.mega_showdown.waterium-z.tooltip: Z-Crystal associated with the Water type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Water-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.z-ring.tooltip: Bracelet that allows a Trainer and their Pokémon to gather the Z-Power required to perform Z-Moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.tera_item.tooltip: Orb that allows a Trainer to Terastallize their Pokémon, temporarily changing its type and boosting its moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.n_lunarizer.toolti: Used to fuse Lunala with a mysterious being
tooltip.mega_showdown.n_solarizer.toolti: Used to fuse Solgaleo with a mysterious being
tooltip.mega_showdown.dna_splicer.toolti: Used to fuse Reshiram/Zekrom with a mysterious being
tooltip.mega_showdown.reins_of_unity.too: Used to fuse Spectrier/Glastrier with a mysterious being
tooltip.mega_showdown.rusted_sword.toolt: It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times.
tooltip.mega_showdown.rusted_shield.tool: It is said that a hero used this shield to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times.
tooltip.mega_showdown.prison_bottle.tool: A bottle believed to have been used to seal away the power of a certain Pokémon long, long ago.
